actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on {3R-{3-alpha(R),4-beta}}-4(acetyloxy)-3-{{(1,1-dimethyl ethyl) dimethyl-siyl}oxy}ethyl}-2-azetidinone.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on (3R-(3-alpha(R), 4-beta))-4-(acetyloxy)-3-)1-(1,1-dimethyl ethyl) dimethylsily1) oxy)ethyl)-2-azetidinone.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on {3R-{3-alpha(R),4-beta}}-4(acetyloxy)-3-{{(1,1-dimethyl ethyl) dimethyl-siyl}oxy}ethyl}-2-azetidinone.
